description: Defines a Flutter widget class 'TopBar' which is a custom application top bar with optional actions, styled according to the theme.

classes.name: TopBar
classes.description: A lightweight, style-guide aligned top app bar with optional actions, implemented as a stateless widget with preferred size.

methods.name: TopBar
methods.description: Constructor for the TopBar widget, with optional title and actions.

methods.name: preferredSize
methods.description: Getter that returns the preferred size (height) of the app bar.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the top bar, styling and arranging the title, actions, and user avatar.
